Mexican fast-food restaurant in hot water
Posted: Mar 22, 2012 9:00 PM Updated: Mar 23, 2012 8:37 AM
Rating:
0.0 (0 votes) TUCSON - Los Beto's on W. Ajo Way received five critical violations. A cook was rolling burritos with his bare hands. Raw shrimp was stored above ready-to-eat chili beef, and there was not hot water in the facility.
Los Beto's on W. Ajo Way is operating on a "Provisional" license.
Chili's on Broadway received two critical violations. Several foods were not cooked to the correct temperature. Plus, the soda gun cups holder had a slimey growth on it. Chili's on Broadway received a "Good" rating.
Bella Vita Pizzeria on Ina passed its re-inspection.
Waffle House on Grant, Pappoules at the Foothills Mall and Mamma Llama's on Craycroft all received an "Excellent" rating.
